廃物: (はいぶつ) - scrap; junk; waste material
廃用症候群: (はいようしょうこうぐん) - disuse syndrome
廃疾条件: (はいしつじょうけん) - disability clause
廃統合: (はいとうごう) - (from 廃合 and 統合) consolidation (esp. of a market); shakeout; rationalization
廃線: (はいせん) - abandoned railway line; closed railway line; discontinued line
廃藩: (はいはん) - abolition of the han system
廃藩置県: (はいはんちけん) - (yoji) abolition of feudal domains and establishment of prefectures
廃車: (はいしゃ) - decommissioned vehicle; out of service vehicle
廃部: (はいぶ) - abolished club; club that has had its status repealed
廃鉱: (はいこう) - abandoned mine; disused mine
廃駅: (はいえき) - abandoned station; closed station
廉々: (かどかど) - each point; each part
廉価版: (れんかばん) - popular edition; bargain priced edition; cheap edition
廉廉: (かどかど) - each point; each part
廉恥心: (れんちしん) - sense of honor; sense of honour
廓清: (かくせい) - purification; cleaning up; purging
廓言葉: (くるわことば) - sociolect or secret language used by prostitutes in red-light districts (Edo period); vulgar words used by prostitutes (Edo period)
廓詞: (くるわことば) - sociolect or secret language used by prostitutes in red-light districts (Edo period); vulgar words used by prostitutes (Edo period)
廚子: (ずし) - miniature shrine with double doors (used to store important Buddhist items such as sutras, etc.); cabinet with double doors (used by the nobility to store books, etc.); (in Okinawa) carved and decorated stone container for storing the bones of one's ancestors
廟: (びょう) - Mausoléu, mausoléu; santuário; a corte (imperial)
廟号: (びょうごう) - temple name (a two-character posthumous name given to Chinese, Korean and Vietnamese royalty); name given to a mausoleum (or shrine, etc.)
廢する: (はいする) - to abolish/to abandon/to repeal/to discontinue; to dethrone/to depose
廣報: (こうほう) - public relations; PR; publicity; information; publicizing
廣汎: (こうはん) - wide; extensive; comprehensive; far-reaching; widespread
廬山会議: (ろざんかいぎ) - Lushan Conference (1959 meeting of the Communist Party of China to discuss the Great Leap Forward)
延いて: (ひいて) - not only ... but also; in addition to; consequently
延いては: (ひいては) - not only ... but also; in addition to; consequently
延て: (ひいて) - not only ... but also; in addition to; consequently
延ばす: (のばす) - (esp. 伸ばす) to grow long (e.g. hair, nails); to lengthen/to extend/to stretch; (esp. 伸ばす) to reach out/to hold out; to straighten/to smooth out; to spread evenly (dough, cream, etc.); to dilute/to thin out; (esp. 延ばす) to postpone; to prolong; to strengthen/to develop/to expand
延び: (ノビ) - growth/development; stretching (e.g. body when waking up); spread/elongation/extension/carry (e.g. of sound)/sustain
延びる: (のびる) - to stretch/to extend/to lengthen/to spread; to make progress/to grow (beard, body height); to grow stale (soba); to be straightened/to be flattened/to be smoothed; to be exhausted; (延びる only) to be postponed/to be prolonged
延び延び: (のびのび) - stretching; repeatedly put off; procrastinate
延び延びになる: (のびのびになる) - to be delayed
延び率: (のびりつ) - growth rate; coefficient of extension
延べ: (のべ) - futures; credit (buying); stretching; total (preceding counter, unit, etc.)/aggregate/gross
延べる: (のべる) - to lay out (a futon)/to make (bed)/to spread out/to stretch/to widen; (延べる, 伸べる only) to postpone/to extend
延べ受講者数: (のべじゅこうしゃすう) - total number of trainees
延べ坪数: (のべつぼすう) - total floor space
延べ払い輸出: (のべばらいゆしゅつ) - exporting on a deferred-payment basis
延べ時間: (のべじかん) - total man-hours; total hours
延べ紙: (のべがみ) - high-quality Edo-period tissue paper (21 cm by 27 cm)
延べ語数: (のべごすう) - total number of words used (in a text)
延べ金: (のべがね) - sheet metal; dagger; sword
延元: (えんげん) - Engen era (of the Southern Court) (1336.2.29-1340.4.28)
延命: (えんみょう) - keeping alive longer; prolonging life; life extension; life-support
延命息災: (えんみょうそくさい) - (yoji)  health and longevity; enjoying a long and healthy life being untouched by disaster
延命治療: (えんめいちりょう) - life-prolonging treatment
延喜式: (えんぎしき) - Engi-Shiki (set of ancient Japanese governmental regulations)
延坪島砲撃事件: (ヨンピョンドほうげきじけん) - Bombardment of Yeonpyeong (Nov. 23, 2010)
